author: David

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.3 (21/9/2016) Solved problem with language that made start always with tagalog language selected and showing all in tagalog.

Version 1.2
---------------
Added configuration menu.
Added vibration optional when tear fall down.
Added acceleration in movement of palette.
Added another mode of play : time play. It's like first version but with time (shown up where lives where in live mode play).
Added multilanguage mode : spanish , english , tagalog and waray (waray still not made, waray is the same as english)
Added time object in time mode. When you get it , time is increased in 15 seconds.
In time mode, every 40 points, time is increased in 15 seconds.

Versión 1.1 news (9/3/2016):
-changed speed of falling tears.
-now two types of objects : black tear and white tear.
-now saves the highest 5 scores.
-added "acerca de" menu

Novedades versión 1.1 (9/3/2016):
-cambiada velocidad de caida de gotas
-ahora hay 2 tipos de objeto : gota negra y gota blanca.
-ahora almacena las 5 puntuaciones mas altas.
-añadido menu "acerca de"

First version published. One works running game, high scores not working (it'll work in future).
It's not finished yet, but you can play catching the spots falling and adding score.
It never endings for the moment.
I'll implement in the future lives.

description:
It's a simple catcher game.
You have 2 modes of play : time mode and lives mode.
In time mode you will play until time goes to 0.
In lives mode you will play until no lives left.
You have to catch tears (black and white).
In time mode you can catch a clock for adding time.
Black tear add two points to score, white add four points.
Added animation of objects crashed.
In lives mode there are five lives and for the moment there weren't added none while playing.
It saves the 5 hightest score to pebble for every mode : 5 for lives mode and another 5 for time mode. 
Menu and messages are shown in 4 configurable languages : spanish , english , tagalog and waray.
Waray language already not yet, waray for the moment is the same as english.
Tagalog language with the help of google translate, not revised.
Default language is spanish.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.3 (21/9/2016) Solved problem with language that made start always with tagalog language selected and showing all in tagalog.

title: Catcher
